properties.areaDesc: Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Advisory issued February 13 at 4:14AM EST until February 14 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Light accumulation of freezing spray expected.

* WHERE...Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to noon EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

NWSheadline: FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON EST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
